title: Seek Joy, Find Beauty, Share Love
description: Delight in beautiful images of our natural world and meditative reflections on finding our place in it. Place yourself in a serene mind frame and enhance any meditation practice. Seek Joy is a meditation in itself. Designed to be a gift book."Amazing! After reading "Seek Joy," I will never look at flowers the same way again!" exclaimed an early reader.Previously available only by special order, the original contemplative coffee table photo artbook is now available on Amazon for immediate download as an e-book as well as a Softcover in limited quantity. E-book is 69 pages. The Softcover is 8.5 X 11 in. & 104 pages of full-color loaded with extra content, images and a fresh vibrant cover.
author: Saira Priest
